name: reactive-props
description: An all-in-one implementation of the Reactive State for Data & DOM patterns.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run babel:extras && npm run babel:typeof && npm run fix:default && npm run min && npm run test
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.babel:extras: npm run babel:dom && npm run babel:state
scripts.babel:dom: rollup --config rollup/babel.dom.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' dom.js && rm -rf dom.js.bck
scripts.babel:state: rollup --config rollup/babel.state.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' state.js && rm -rf state.js.bck
scripts.babel:typeof: drop-babel-typeof index.js && drop-babel-typeof dom.max.js && drop-babel-typeof state.max.js
scripts.min: terser index.js --comments='/^!/' -c -m -o min.js && npm run min:extras && rm {dom.max.js,state.max.js}
scripts.min:extras: terser dom.max.js --comments='/^!/' -c -m -o dom.js && terser state.max.js --comments='/^!/' -c -m -o state.js
scripts.fix:default: npm run fix:index && npm run fix:extras

author: Andrea Giammarchi
